task.title: Selecting the Parent of an Element in Editing Window

context.p: You can select the parent of an element with all its content.
To select the parent of an element in the Editing Window, do the following:

step.cmd: Select the parent of the element.

info.p: Select the parent of the element one of these ways:

choice.p: Press Ctrl-Alt-UpArrow twice (or more to select the parent of the parent and so on).
Choose Edit Select Parent twice (or more to select the parent of the parent and so on).

fig.title: The parent of the element selected in the Editing Window.
